name: Vertek
description: Vertek Dex is a community-driven decentralized exchange that supports multi-token and weighted pools, automated portfolio management, liquidity deepening and oracle data price sensing on the Binance Smart Chain. It allows for the creation of bespoke crypto indexes of up to 8 tokens, while optimizing yield farming and liquidity mining potential with a ve- gauge voting system. Vertek adopts powerful features to slash gas costs, super-charge capital efficiency, unlock arbitrage with zero-token starting capital, and open the door to custom AMMs.
